turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I would like to order some pizzas from Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, sounds delicious. what type of pizzas would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I want to order four small pizzas. I wanted them, well, one of them to be pepperoni. I want another one to be a meat lovers with pepperoni and chorizo and bacon. I want the third one to be vegetables with olive oil, onions, and mushrooms. And I will need another one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: to be just cheese. And I want all of them to have extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: could you please repeat the 3rd pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, it's a veggie veggie pizza with olive oils, onions, and mushrooms. You can add peppers, too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me read that back to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: to make sure i got it right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 small pizzas, 1 pepperoni, 1 meat lovers with pepperoni, chorizo, and bacon, and 1 veggies with olive oil, onions, peppers and mushroom, and 1 cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome. let's place that order. the total will be $48.22.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to purchase now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please. I would like to purchase now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool, i've placed your order. the pizzas will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else i can help with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that would be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it! take care.
